Method Detail

helpOption

public static org.apache.commons.cli2.Option helpOption()
Returns a default command line option for help. Used by all clustering jobs and many others

inputOption

public static org.apache.commons.cli2.builder.DefaultOptionBuilder inputOption()
Returns a default command line option for input directory specification. Used by all clustering jobs plus others

clustersInOption

public static org.apache.commons.cli2.builder.DefaultOptionBuilder clustersInOption()
Returns a default command line option for clusters input directory specification. Used by FuzzyKmeans, Kmeans

outputOption

public static org.apache.commons.cli2.builder.DefaultOptionBuilder outputOption()
Returns a default command line option for output directory specification. Used by all clustering jobs plus others

overwriteOption

public static org.apache.commons.cli2.builder.DefaultOptionBuilder overwriteOption()
Returns a default command line option for output directory overwriting. Used by all clustering jobs

distanceMeasureOption

public static org.apache.commons.cli2.builder.DefaultOptionBuilder distanceMeasureOption()
Returns a default command line option for specification of distance measure class to use. Used by Canopy, FuzzyKmeans, Kmeans, MeanShift

methodOption

public static org.apache.commons.cli2.builder.DefaultOptionBuilder methodOption()
Returns a default command line option for specification of sequential or parallel operation. Used by Canopy, FuzzyKmeans, Kmeans, MeanShift, Dirichlet

t1Option

public static org.apache.commons.cli2.builder.DefaultOptionBuilder t1Option()
Returns a default command line option for specification of T1. Used by Canopy, MeanShift

t2Option

public static org.apache.commons.cli2.builder.DefaultOptionBuilder t2Option()
Returns a default command line option for specification of T2. Used by Canopy, MeanShift

t3Option

public static org.apache.commons.cli2.builder.DefaultOptionBuilder t3Option()
Returns a default command line option for specification of T3 (Reducer T1). Used by Canopy

t4Option

public static org.apache.commons.cli2.builder.DefaultOptionBuilder t4Option()
Returns a default command line option for specification of T4 (Reducer T2). Used by Canopy

clusterFilterOption

public static org.apache.commons.cli2.builder.DefaultOptionBuilder clusterFilterOption()
Returns:
a DefaultOptionBuilder for the clusterFilter option

maxIterationsOption

public static org.apache.commons.cli2.builder.DefaultOptionBuilder maxIterationsOption()
Returns a default command line option for specification of max number of iterations. Used by Dirichlet, FuzzyKmeans, Kmeans, LDA

numClustersOption

public static org.apache.commons.cli2.builder.DefaultOptionBuilder numClustersOption()
Returns a default command line option for specification of numbers of clusters to create. Used by Dirichlet, FuzzyKmeans, Kmeans

convergenceOption

public static org.apache.commons.cli2.builder.DefaultOptionBuilder convergenceOption()
Returns a default command line option for convergence delta specification. Used by FuzzyKmeans, Kmeans, MeanShift

numReducersOption

@Deprecated
public static org.apache.commons.cli2.builder.DefaultOptionBuilder numReducersOption()
Deprecated. 

Returns a default command line option for specifying the max number of reducers. Used by Dirichlet, FuzzyKmeans, Kmeans and LDA

clusteringOption

public static org.apache.commons.cli2.builder.DefaultOptionBuilder clusteringOption()
Returns a default command line option for clustering specification. Used by all clustering except LDA

analyzerOption

public static org.apache.commons.cli2.builder.DefaultOptionBuilder analyzerOption()
Returns a default command line option for specifying a Lucene analyzer class

Returns:
DefaultOptionBuilder

emitMostLikelyOption

public static org.apache.commons.cli2.builder.DefaultOptionBuilder emitMostLikelyOption()
Returns a default command line option for specifying the emitMostLikely flag. Used by Dirichlet and FuzzyKmeans

thresholdOption

public static org.apache.commons.cli2.builder.DefaultOptionBuilder thresholdOption()
Returns a default command line option for specifying the clustering threshold value. Used by Dirichlet and FuzzyKmeans

public static org.apache.commons.cli2.builder.DefaultOptionBuilder outlierThresholdOption()
